name.ja: <ruby>夢<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>中<rt>ちゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>再<rt>さい</rt></ruby><ruby>誕<rt>たん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card(s) during their turn, or when your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster during their turn, while you have an Insect Type monster in your Graveyard.

effect.en: Fusion Summon a LIGHT Attribute Insect Type monster by sending 1 face-up monster from your field and 1 face-up Level 9 or lower monster from either field to the Graveyard as material.
